Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is SWITZERLAND 1. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 18 CH1. Alpine tourism has a long tradition in Switzerland. Many towns and rural areas in the Alps depend on the tourism industry (hotels, restaurants and sports attractions such as ski lifts). The standard with which these tourism infrastructures are built differs greatly between richer and less prosperous regions.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is unspecified. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Current and Predicted. This VC is classified as Traditional and Innovative.   The type of innovation of this VC (Value Chain) is Endogenous and Exogenous. this VC catches a very large variety of touristic attractions, some are traditional (skiing) some innovative and some a mix of both. The innovation is related to New products, New processes, New marketing strategies and New governance systems. The land use systems involved are Landscape in general. The local assets include Natural, social and cultural.
